161.Hu Chang,Pp.336-337.See also Sanshiwu nian,p.325.In May 1976 Zhang
Chunqiao approved a plan to import 5os foreign and Hong Kong films for
apparentlyprivateviewing asreferencematerial,a case cited toillustrate
Gang of Four’hypocrisy:Sirenbang shi dianying shiye de sidi,p.19s.For-
eign‘reference films’(ziliao pian) are mentioned in Dianying yishu,1994,3
(June), 69,in Wang Lian, p. 76, and by Zhang Ruifang, who dubbed a role
in one,p.388.
